BUILD_SHARED_LIBS:BOOL=true

# Misc flags

VTK_ALL_NEW_OBJECT_FACTORY:BOOL=true
VTK_BUILD_DOCUMENTATION:BOOL=false
VTK_BUILD_TESTING:BOOL=false
BUILD_TESTING:BOOL=false
VTK_LEGACY_REMOVE:BOOL=true
VTK_DATA_EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL:BOOL=true
VTK_FORBID_DOWNLOADS:BOOL=true
VTK_ENABLE_REMOTE_MODULES:BOOL=false
VTK_INSTALL_PYTHON_EXES:BOOL=false

# Would love to have this set to true, but it causes VisIt compile to
# fail in debug mode

VTK_REPORT_OPENGL_ERRORS:BOOL=false

# groups, disable all

VTK_GROUP_ENABLE_Imaging:STRING=DONT_WANT
VTK_GROUP_ENABLE_MPI:STRING=DONT_WANT
VTK_GROUP_ENABLE_Qt:STRING=DONT_WANT
VTK_GROUP_ENABLE_Rendering:STRING=DONT_WANT
VTK_GROUP_ENABLE_StandAlone:STRING=DONT_WANT
VTK_GROUP_ENABLE_Tk:STRING=DONT_WANT
VTK_GROUP_ENABLE_Views:STRING=DONT_WANT
VTK_GROUP_ENABLE_Web:STRING=DONT_WANT

# modules, enable what visit needs

VTK_MODULE_ENABLE_VTK_CommonCore:STRING=YES
VTK_MODULE_ENABLE_VTK_FiltersFlowPaths:STRING=YES
VTK_MODULE_ENABLE_VTK_FiltersHybrid:STRING=YES
VTK_MODULE_ENABLE_VTK_FiltersModeling:STRING=YES
VTK_MODULE_ENABLE_VTK_GeovisCore:STRING=YES
VTK_MODULE_ENABLE_VTK_IOEnSight:STRING=YES
VTK_MODULE_ENABLE_VTK_IOGeometry:STRING=YES
VTK_MODULE_ENABLE_VTK_IOLegacy:STRING=YES
VTK_MODULE_ENABLE_VTK_IOPLY:STRING=YES
VTK_MODULE_ENABLE_VTK_IOXML:STRING=YES
VTK_MODULE_ENABLE_VTK_InteractionStyle:STRING=YES
VTK_MODULE_ENABLE_VTK_RenderingAnnotation:STRING=YES
VTK_MODULE_ENABLE_VTK_RenderingFreeType:STRING=YES
VTK_MODULE_ENABLE_VTK_RenderingOpenGL2:STRING=YES
VTK_MODULE_ENABLE_VTK_RenderingVolumeOpenGL2:STRING=YES
VTK_MODULE_ENABLE_VTK_libxml2:STRING=YES
VTK_MODULE_ENABLE_VTK_RenderingRayTracing:STRING=YES

# python

VTK_WRAP_PYTHON:BOOL=true
VTK_PYTHON_VERSION:STRING=3
Python3_LIBRARY:FILEPATH=C:/A_VisIt/InvestigateVTK9/visit-deps/windowsbuild/MSVC2017/python/3.7.7/libs/python37.lib
Python3_INCLUDE_DIR:PATH=C:/A_VisIt/InvestigateVTK9/visit-deps/windowsbuild/MSVC2017/python/3.7.7/include
Python3_EXECUTABLE:FILEPATH=C:/A_VisIt/InvestigateVTK9/visit-deps/windowsbuild/MSVC2017/python/3.7.7/python.exe

# ospray
ospray_DIR:PATH=C:/A_VisIt/InvestigateVTK9/visit-deps/windowsbuild/MSVC2017/ospray/2.8.0.x86_64.windows/lib/cmake/ospray-2.8.0

# QT

VTK_QT_VERSION:STRING=5
VTK_MODULE_ENABLE_VTK_GUISupportQt:STRING=YES
Qt5_DIR:PATH=C:/A_VisIt/InvestigateVTK9/visit-deps/windowsbuild/MSVC2017/Qt/5.14.2/lib/cmake/Qt5


# ZLIB

VTK_MODULE_USE_EXTERNAL_VTK_zlib:BOOL=true
ZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR:PATH=C:/A_VisIt/InvestigateVTK9/visit-deps/windowsbuild/MSVC2017/zlib/1.2.11/include
ZLIB_LIBRARY_RELEASE:FILEPATH=C:/A_VisIt/InvestigateVTK9/visit-deps/windowsbuild/MSVC2017/zlib/1.2.11/lib/zlib.lib

# JPEG

VTK_MODULE_USE_EXTERNAL_VTK_jpeg:BOOL=true
JPEG_INCLUDE_DIR:PATH=C:/A_VisIt/InvestigateVTK9/visit-deps/windowsbuild/MSVC2017/jpeg/9b/include
JPEG_LIBRARY_RELEASE:FILEPATH=C:/A_VisIt/InvestigateVTK9/visit-deps/windowsbuild/MSVC2017/jpeg/9b/lib/jpeg.lib

# tiff -- Needed to build tiff for Pillow, might as well have VTK use it

VTK_MODULE_USE_EXTERNAL_VTK_tiff:BOOL=true
TIFF_INCLUDE_DIR:PATH=C:/A_VisIt/InvestigateVTK9/visit-deps/windowsbuild/MSVC2017/tiff/4.2.0/include
TIFF_LIBRARY_RELEASE:FILEPATH=C:/A_VisIt/InvestigateVTK9/visit-deps/windowsbuild/MSVC2017/tiff/4.2.0/lib/tiff.lib


#installation location
CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=C:/A_VisIt/InvestigateVTK9/visit-deps/windowsbuild/MSVC2017/vtk/9.1.0
